docs.lead_paragraph: On even the bleakest of mornings, at least a half-dozen women of assorted shapes and sizes can be seen jogging along Manhattan's exclusive Sutton Place cement and asphalt turf.

headline.main: HEALTH AND BEAUTY: A MEDICAL VIEW; ISOMETRICS: HEALTH HEALTH
